scripts.allure-report: allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npm run generate-report || npm run generate-report
scripts.web: wdio run ./configs/wdio.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.swivelgroup: wdio run ./configs/wdio-swivelgroup.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.swiveltech: wdio run ./configs/wdio-swiveltech.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.swivelfinance: wdio run ./configs/wdio-swivelfinance.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.web-BS: wdio run ./configs/web-browserstack.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.mobile-web-BS: wdio run ./configs/mobile-web-browserstack.conf.js && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
scripts.real-ios-device: wdio run ./configs/wdioMobile.conf.js safaridriver --enable && npm run allure-report || npm run allure-report
